Articles.Content:
Hi there, I have made a thread, and since Kerbal history timeline is locked, I will make one with NO wars!

Rules!

NO WARS

No silly things, keep it serious!

YOU ARE SUPPOSED TO POST IN CHRONOLOGICAL ORDER!

Fyre Flame: Kerbals Exist in 100, Kerbals go to space in 500, Present is 5000, Humans will be met in 6000, Extinction of Kerbals is 10000.

NO TIME TRAVEL unless it is something minor but apart from that, NO TIME TRAVEL

Now, let us start where Fyre Flame left off!

1136: Critter Crawlers are widespread in kerbal space center delivering rocket parts and cargo

This is still really close to roleplay and the other thread is still under review, I'll thank you to refrain from this topic for the current time

Closing.
